comprehensive_overview: Tigmint is a software tool that aids in the rearrangement and duplication error correction in genomes assembled with linked-read sequencing technologies such as 10X Genomics.
core_features: Corrects errors in genome assemblies from linked-read sequencing technologies
Identifies misassemblies, corrects genome misassemblies, and fills gaps in assemblies
Efficiently handles large and complex genomes
Improves the accuracy and contiguity of genome assemblies
